sentences.en: During the remainder of the week it was very much the same.
sentences.cn: 那一星期剩下几天的情况大同小异.

sentences.en: Efforts to persuade the remainder to follow suit have continued.
sentences.cn: 说服其余人跟着效仿的努力仍在继续。

sentences.en: Fifteen divided by four gives you a remainder of 3.
He gulped down the remainder of his coffee.
sentences.cn: 他把剩下的咖啡一口气喝了下去。

sentences.en: His widow became a virtual recluse for the remainder of her life.
sentences.cn: 他的寡妻孤寂地度过了余生。

sentences.en: I kept some of his books and gave away the remainder.
sentences.cn: 我保留了一些他的书，其他的都送人了。

sentences.en: Of the 59 committee members, 40 were against legalisation, 13 were in favour and the remainder were undecided.
sentences.cn: 在59个委员会委员中，有40人反对这项法案,13人赞成，其余的尚未表明态度。

sentences.en: Only 5.9 per cent of the area is now covered in trees. Most of the remainder is farmland.
sentences.cn: 这个地区的树木覆盖率只有5.9%。其他多数地方都是农田。

sentences.en: Part of the new plant is now in operation and remainder will be on stream later this month.
sentences.cn: 新工厂现已部分开工,其余部分在本月末将全部投产.

sentences.en: Part of the new plant is now in operation and the remainder will be on stream later this month.
sentences.cn: 新工厂现已部分开工,其余部分在本月底前将全力投入生产.

sentences.en: Take 4 from 9 and the remainder is 5.
The remainder he would pay up as soon as he could.
sentences.cn: 是否有可能让他恢复原职?这一点他只是暗示了一下.

sentences.en: The remainder must be paid by the end of June.
sentences.cn: 剩余款项必须在6月底之前支付。

sentences.en: The remainder of the line was formed of strangers.
sentences.cn: 队伍中其余的人则是陌生人.

sentences.en: They joined up with us to spend the remainder of the holiday.
sentences.cn: 他们来跟我们一起共度余下的假期.

sentences.en: This stone is far older than the remainder of the house.
sentences.cn: 这种石头比房子的其余部分古老得多.

sentences.en: Three of us sweep and mop the floor and the remainder clean the window.
sentences.cn: 我们之中三人扫地拖地板,其余的人擦玻璃.

words.tran_cn: 保持；依然；留下；剩余；逗留；残存

trans.tran_cn: 剩余物，其他人员，差数，廉价出售的图书
trans.tran_en: the part of something that is left after everything else has gone or been dealt with
